name: aisteth
description: AI-powered medical assistant platform for healthcare providers

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:prisma && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run dev
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:prisma
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.db:push: cd backend && $env:PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE='wasm'; npx prisma db push

author: AISteth Team
